required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sintilimab (IBI308) in the Neoadjuvant Treatment of Patients With Resectable II-IIIA NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: Exploratory Efficacy and Safety Study of PD-1 Inhibitor Sintilimab (IBI308) in the Neoadjuvant Treatment of Patients With Resectable II-IIIA NSCLC

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to investigate the safety and efficacy of Sintilimab (IBI308) in patients with resectable NSCLC, and to provide new treatment options for neoadjuvant therapy in patients with stage II-IIIA NSCLC

detailed_description.textblock: Sintilimab injection (IBI308) as neoadjuvant therapy in patients with resectable NSCLC

primary_outcome.measure: Major pathologic response rate(MPR)(<10% viable tumor cells)
primary_outcome.description: To assess the major pathologic response rate (<10% viable tumor cells) in patients receiving Sintilimab Injection

secondary_outcome.description: the proportion of patients with a best overall response of CR, PR or SD in the whole body, as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator.
the proportion of patients with a best overall confirmed response of CR or PR in the whole body as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator
Defined as the time from date of surgery until recurrence of tumor or death from any cause
Immune-related AE per Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE V5.0)
Grade 3 or higher per Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE V5.0)

arm_group.description: Drugs: Eligible patients received two doses of intravenous sintilimab (200 mg) every 3 weeks (Q3W). Each infusion time is 30-60min. Surgery: The patient underwent imaging examinations within 7 days prior to surgery, including chest CT and related metastatic examinations. The patient underwent surgery 6-8 weeks after the first dose.

intervention.description: Sintilimab injection 200mg, 2cycles of treatment before surgery

overall_official.affiliation: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute
